notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at the Council-Chamber in Dublin the 23rd. day of March, 1691.".
Dates given according to Lady Day dating.
Concerning claims under the treaty of Limerick.--Steele.
Steele notation: Arms 193. the cles 2) to aforesaid,.
